attributes.action: Abolish NHS funding & give the money to Leeds United FC
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Leeds United has no money. The NHS wastes too much, we would like to see some of this money go to leeds united instead of spending on healthcare, which is pricey and pointless seeing as we're all gonna die eventually.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
